/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades painted in a palette of predominantly beige and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a cloudy sky, a common sight in urban landscapes.
